subject: Gymnastics
Dengue Fever
lead_paragraph: The two-time world champion Diego Hypolito of Brazil, who has contracted dengue fever, was released from a hospital. His doctor said it should not disrupt Hypolito’s preparations for the Beijing Games. An outbreak of fever has sickened nearly 50,000 in Rio de Janeiro this year.
